UnitStatus.Active-question: Has this unit been deactivated or decertified?
UnitStatus.Wage-question: Did this unit receive any wage increases or decreases between 8/1/22 - 7/31/23?
UnitStatus.Bargaining-question: Is this unit still bargaining for any part of the 8/1/22 - 7/31/23 period?

Special.Special-question: Did any part of the unit receive special pay increases or decreases in addition to the across the board increases or decreases reported above?
